entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
